name: ts-modules-done-right-2022
description: write ts esm modules and publish as multi target consumable

scripts.clean: npm run clean:out && npm run clean:dist
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run compile:cjs && npm run compile:esm && npm run build:dist
scripts.buid:dist:rename:esm: mv out/esm/index.js out/esm/index.mjs && mv out/esm/MyCustomClass.class.js out/esm/MyCustomClass.class.mjs
scripts.esm: npm run build && npm run buid:dist:rename:esm && node out/esm/index.mjs

author: Marcel Donges
